About

Interdiscplinary Technologist, Self-Directed Learner, Digital Humanist

Researcher of decentralized technology with the intention of real-world cross-industry applications, spurred on by having a sustainable, innovative and curious mindset in some of the areas that inspire me:

  • Fashion
  • Tech - DLTs, digital passports
  • Textiles - biotech, organic/biodegradable fibres
  • Sustainability - regenerative agriculture
  • History
  • Photography
